original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1056)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(766)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對自身範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(159)@</color> 秒內對全體敵方武將造成沉默狀態，此狀態讓武將只能發動第一招。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1056)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(766)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage to the enemy within its own range, and creates a silent state for all enemy generals within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(159)@</color> seconds, this state Let the generals only launch the first move.
